sources.description:
Prisoners Of War Fight Back | Amazing Drama History Movie | True Story | Blood And Glory

Set during the Anglo-Boer War, prisoners of war take a stand against their British captors in a game of rugby. 

2016.  Stars: Stian Bam, Charlotte Salt, Grant Swanby
